title: India A "Cyber Adversary", Says Trudeau Government, New Delhi Shreds Claim
content: The Justin Trudeau-led Canadian government's latest action suggests it has started treating India as an enemy country. India has been added to a list of enemy nations in terms of cyber security and has been labelled a 'cyber adversary'.
summary: The Justin Trudeau-led Canadian government's latest action suggests it has started treating India as an enemy country. India has been added to a list of enemy nations in terms of cyber security and has been labelled a 'cyber adversary'.

title: "Harassment, Intimidation": India On Surveillance Of Officials In Canada
content: As its ties with Canada continued to remain at an all-time low, India on Saturday said some of its consular officials were informed by the Canadian government that they have been under audio and video surveillance.
summary: As its ties with Canada continued to remain at an all-time low, India on Saturday said some of its consular officials were informed by the Canadian government that they have been under audio and video surveillance.

title: Canadian Diplomat Summoned After Allegations Against Amit Shah By Minister
content: Rubbishing a Canadian minister's claims that Home Minister Amit Shah had ordered the targeting of Sikh separatists in the country, India has termed them absurd and baseless and said a representative of the Canadian High Commission had been summoned.
summary: Rubbishing a Canadian minister's claims that Home Minister Amit Shah had ordered the targeting of Sikh separatists in the country, India has termed them absurd and baseless and said a representative of the Canadian High Commission had been summoned.

title: Moscow Denies 'Baseless' Claim Russia Behind Fake US Election Video
content: Moscow denied it was behind fake videos about the US election after American intelligence said Russia was behind a fake video showing a Haitian immigrant claiming to have voted multiple times.
summary: Moscow denied it was behind fake videos about the US election after American intelligence said Russia was behind a fake video showing a Haitian immigrant claiming to have voted multiple times.

title: Japan Records Hottest October Since 1898, Warm Weather Continues This Month
content: Japan logged record-breaking temperatures in October, marking the hottest October since record-keeping began in 1898, data from the Japan Meteorological Agency (JMA) showed.
summary: Japan logged record-breaking temperatures in October, marking the hottest October since record-keeping began in 1898, data from the Japan Meteorological Agency (JMA) showed.

title: OpenAI Releases ChatGPT Search Engine, Taking On Google
content: OpenAI ramped up its ChatGPT generative AI chatbot with search engine capabilities, as the startup takes on Google's decades-long dominance of web search.
summary: OpenAI ramped up its ChatGPT generative AI chatbot with search engine capabilities, as the startup takes on Google's decades-long dominance of web search.

title: Graphic Artist Jailed In France Over Livestreamed Child Rape
content: A French court sentenced a graphic artist who worked on beloved animated feature films for Pixar and Disney to 25 years in jail for ordering the livestreamed rape of preteen girls in the Philippines.
summary: A French court sentenced a graphic artist who worked on beloved animated feature films for Pixar and Disney to 25 years in jail for ordering the livestreamed rape of preteen girls in the Philippines.

title: Hezbollah Says Launched Rockets At Intelligence Base Near Tel Aviv
content: Lebanon's Hezbollah said on Saturday it had launched rockets at an Israeli intelligence base near Tel Aviv in the early hours of Saturday.
summary: Lebanon's Hezbollah said on Saturday it had launched rockets at an Israeli intelligence base near Tel Aviv in the early hours of Saturday.

title: Trump Says 'Big Role' For Vaccine Skeptic RFK Jr In Health Care If He Wins
content: Donald Trump announced that Kennedy family scion and vaccine skeptic Robert F. Kennedy Jr. would play a "big role" in his administration if the Republican former president were to win next week's election.
summary: Donald Trump announced that Kennedy family scion and vaccine skeptic Robert F. Kennedy Jr. would play a "big role" in his administration if the Republican former president were to win next week's election.

title: Peanut, The Squirrel With 537,000 Followers On Instagram, Euthanised In US
content: A squirrel named Peanut who was propelled to the heights of internet celebrity has been euthanised, New York authorities said, biting a government staffer on the way out.
summary: A squirrel named Peanut who was propelled to the heights of internet celebrity has been euthanised, New York authorities said, biting a government staffer on the way out.

title: Sara Sharif's Father "Hit Her Like Crazy", Made Her Do Sit-Ups All Night
content: The father of Sara Sharif, a British-Pakistani 10-year-old girl whose death sparked an international manhunt last year, forced his daughter to do sit-ups all night because she hid his keys, a court heard earlier this week.
summary: The father of Sara Sharif, a British-Pakistani 10-year-old girl whose death sparked an international manhunt last year, forced his daughter to do sit-ups all night because she hid his keys, a court heard earlier this week.

title: Elon Musk Lays Off Employees From Social Media Platform X: Report
content: Elon Musk, who is busy promoting Donald Trump for the keenly-watched US presidential election on November 5, has reportedly laid off more employees from his X social media platform.
summary: Elon Musk, who is busy promoting Donald Trump for the keenly-watched US presidential election on November 5, has reportedly laid off more employees from his X social media platform.

title: A Prime Number, With 41,024,320 Digits, Discovered By Ex Nvidia Programmer
content: A 36-year-old man, who earlier worked as a programmer for Nvidia, spent around a year of his life and invested a considerable amount of money to discover the world's largest known prime number.
summary: A 36-year-old man, who earlier worked as a programmer for Nvidia, spent around a year of his life and invested a considerable amount of money to discover the world's largest known prime number.

title: 15 Indian Companies Face US Crackdown Over War Supplies To Russia
content: The US has imposed sanctions on 275 individuals and entities, including 15 from India, for allegedly supporting Russia's military-industrial base.
summary: The US has imposed sanctions on 275 individuals and entities, including 15 from India, for allegedly supporting Russia's military-industrial base.

title: 15 Billion Miles Away, NASA's Voyager 1 Comes Back To Life Using 1981 Tech
content: NASA's 47-year-old Voyager 1 spacecraft recently established contact with Earth after a brief halt with the help of a radio transmitter that has not been used since 1981.
summary: NASA's 47-year-old Voyager 1 spacecraft recently established contact with Earth after a brief halt with the help of a radio transmitter that has not been used since 1981.

title: Iron Beam: Israel's "New Era" Anti-Missile Defence System Will Use Lasers
content: Israel's 'Iron Beam', designed to use high-power laser to down projectiles, will be operational within a year.
summary: Israel's 'Iron Beam', designed to use high-power laser to down projectiles, will be operational within a year.

title: Over 200 Dead In Devastating Spain Flash Floods, Rescue Ops Underway
content: Rescuers raised the death toll in Spain's worst floods for a generation to 205 on Friday and fears grew for the dozens missing as hopes of finding survivors faded.
summary: Rescuers raised the death toll in Spain's worst floods for a generation to 205 on Friday and fears grew for the dozens missing as hopes of finding survivors faded.

title: Ukraine Needs Long-Range Missiles Against North Korean Troops: Zelensky
content: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky on Friday said Ukraine needed permission from its allies to fire long-range missiles into Russia in the face of a North Korean troop deployment there.
summary: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky on Friday said Ukraine needed permission from its allies to fire long-range missiles into Russia in the face of a North Korean troop deployment there.

title: B-52 Bombers, Missile Destroyers: US Announces New Middle East Deployments
content: The United States announced Friday the deployment of additional military assets to the Middle East, including ballistic missile defense destroyers and long-range B-52 bomber aircraft.
summary: The United States announced Friday the deployment of additional military assets to the Middle East, including ballistic missile defense destroyers and long-range B-52 bomber aircraft.

title: Trump's Violent Rhetoric Disqualifying For US Presidency: Kamala Harris
content: US Vice President Kamala Harris lambasted Donald Trump on Friday for her White House rival's "violent rhetoric," saying his recent verbal attack on a Republican critic should disqualify him from becoming president again.
summary: US Vice President Kamala Harris lambasted Donald Trump on Friday for her White House rival's "violent rhetoric," saying his recent verbal attack on a Republican critic should disqualify him from becoming president again.
